Where we keep the bylaws.

Welcome to The CRASH Space Bylaws Repo

We are a big believer in open governance, and we are a hackerspace, so what better way to manage our docs than in version control.

How To Navigate

Rightnow it is just a bunch of text files in the repo. We may move them to the pages format, but for now they are up!

Authors and Contributors

Carlyn Maw headed the original push for these bylaws back in 2011. They are very tightly based off of Noisebridge's. After working sessions that included Sean Bonner, Steve Goldstein, Tod Kurt, Matt Pinner, Levi Simmons, Theron Trowbridge and others, she worked heavily with Tom Wrobel of the non-profit legal center to make sure they said what we wanted them to say before we submitted them to the IRS with our 1023 form.

Support or Contact

If you have questions, please check out http://www.crashspace.org

This project is maintained by CRASHSpace
